title: Why does my TikTok have no mic and layout to my duet after I uninstall the app when they come back? - Quora

response.answer_text: Same with me bro. This is my opinion after speculating about this issue. I think when you uninstalled it and install it back at the moment, Tiktok’s update has turned out;-Mic’s removed-Layout features have taken away-Limiting the effects and;-some few features(comment down below if I missed something) It’s the same with the Musically before Tiktok’s existed, at first there is no problem until I uninstall it (cos I got tired of using it) when I thought of using it again and reinstall it. There are features that had lost like, (1) you can’t pick your own sound on your music playlist, (2)when I post my video privately, the video became really poor in quality and the same result even if I saved it to files. (3)The sound of the video is less timing and convenient in use(4)the Musically app itself had gone and replaced it to Tiktok. What I believe is that Tiktok is very selective to its users as if when you are not active anymore, it will tend to take away the features you wanted in the future.
